63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir:I heard the Prophet (ﷺ) saying, "The Throne (of Allah) shook at the death of Sa`d bin Mu`adh." Through another group of narrators, Jabir added, "I heard the Prophet (ﷺ) : saying, 'The Throne of the Beneficent shook because of the death of Sa`d bin Mu`adh

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنَاقِبُ سَعْدِ بْنِ مُعَاذٍ رضى الله عنه
chapter.eng-name: The merits of Sa'd bin Mu’adh رضي الله عنه
